Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute at Damen/Washington
ShortDescription: 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Madison, Webster, Fulton and Damen: due to, street blockage near Damen/Washington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Madison, Webster, Fulton and Damen: due to, street blockage near Damen/Washington.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Kedzie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem at Kedzie.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
